explains: n. [内科][皮肤] 狼疮；天狼座
wordGroup: systemic lupus erythematosus 全身性红斑狼疮

sentences.en: A few feverish weeks in bed ended in specialist appointment, where I was diagnosed with Lupus and rushedinto hospital for fear that it may have attacked my internal organs.
sentences.cn: 我在床上发烧了几个星期，最后被专科医生诊断为红斑狼疮。我被匆忙送往医院，因为我担心红斑狼疮会袭击我的内脏。

sentences.en: The systematicness lupus erythematosus will lead to arthrodynia.
sentences.cn: 系统性红斑狼疮会导致关节痛。

sentences.en: There are three kinds of lupus.
